section.p:
Student Profiles Manager main window
Student Profiles Manager main window
This window includes:
Main menu (see ), provides access to the principal Student Profiles Manager functions.
Toolbar (see ) for quick access to the most often used functions.
Tree view panel (see ) provides an overview of the student body structure.
Table view panel (see ). This is the panel that displays and allows editing of student profiles and school subdivisions.
Status bar (see ).
